question.xref: DES s7, DES s10, HC r222
question.text: You are following this lorry. You should keep well back from it to

explanation.text: By keeping well back you will increase your width of vision around the rear of the lorry. This will allow you to see further down the road and be prepared for any hazards.

answer.text: give you a good view of the road ahead
stop following traffic from rushing through the junction
prevent traffic behind you from overtaking
allow you to hurry through the traffic lights if they change
